articles.description: Get a report of the Fulham vs. Liverpool 2020-21 English Premier League football match.
articles.content:
Fulham produced a shock upset against Liverpool with a 1-1 draw in front of a live crowd at Craven Cottage.
Liverpool entered the game knowing three points would take them above Tottenham into first… [+2010 chars]
